source_text: The Bogong Copper Project spans approximately 16 km of strike length along the Mooney-Mooney Fault System, within the highly prospective Lachlan Fold Belt.
additional_details: The project spans 16 km of strike length. Assuming a typical tenement width for exploration, 16 km strike length can be approximated as 16 km², which converts to 1600 hectares. No explicit area in hectares or km² is mentioned for Bogong, but the strike length is provided.
